    \raggedright \textbf{get\_correlation\_matrix}(\textit{matrix})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param matrix: [] of []
    List of features to get correlation matrix
:return: [] of []
    correlation matrix
\end{alltt}

    \label{hal:ml:analysis:correlation:show_correlation_matrix}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation.show\_correlation\_matrix \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{show\_correlation\_matrix}(\textit{correlation\_matrix}, \textit{title}, \textit{feature\_list})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param correlation\_matrix: [] of []
    Correlation matrix of features
:param title: str
    Title of plot
:param feature\_list: [] of str
    List of names of features
:return: void
    shows the given correlation matrix as image
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_columns}(\textit{headers\_to\_test}, \textit{headers}, \textit{data})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param headers\_to\_test: [] of str
    List of columns to get correlation matrix of
:param headers: [] of str
    List of all headers in matrix
:param data: [] of []
    Matrix of float values
:return: [] of []
    Correlation matrix of selected columns
\end{alltt}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{show\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_columns}(\textit{title}, \textit{headers\_to\_test}, \textit{headers}, \textit{data})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param title: str
    Title to show
:param headers\_to\_test: [] of str
    List of columns to get correlation matrix of
:param headers: [] of str
    List of all headers in matrix
:param data: [] of []
    Matrix of float values
:return: void
    Shows on screen correlation matrix of selected headers
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:ml:analysis:correlation:save_correlation_matrix_of_columns}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation.save\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_columns \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{save\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_columns}(\textit{title}, \textit{headers\_to\_test}, \textit{headers}, \textit{data}, \textit{out\_file})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param title: str
    Title to show
:param headers\_to\_test: [] of str
    List of columns to get correlation matrix of
:param headers: [] of str
    List of all headers in matrix
:param data: [] of []
    Matrix of float values
:param out\_file: str
    Output file
:return: void
    Saves correlation matrix of selected headers
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.analysis.correlation.save\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_data\_files\_in\_folder \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{save\_correlation\_matrix\_of\_data\_files\_in\_folder}(\textit{folder\_path})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param folder\_path: str
    Folder containing logs data
:return: void
    Saves each file's correlation matrix of common headers
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
